Nick's Blog

FooBar

24 February 2006

This friday's FooBar had a good feel to it. I took a few quick pictures and posted to flickr and found that flickr has a pretty cool clustering feature. Check out FooBar clusters to see how it can take similarly tagged images and display them in 'clusters'.

And of course, the pictures.
